summary.body: Has anyone else noticed how nice the high walk is looking at the moment.  The planting is especially good this year with swathes of same colour planting trather than the normal polkadot effect that most local authorities.  The new gardeners are to be congratulated I think .......
summary.subject: Spring Flowers on the High Walk

summary.body: could we ask for all the lights across the estate to be harmonised to the white lights on the south of the estate and for all the podium parimeter lights to be replaced?
summary.subject: lights

summary.body: what is happening to the tree stump that was kicked down?  can burn it?
summary.subject: art

summary.body: Anyone else have brown mains water in Ben Jonson, seems to have just started this morning....
summary.subject: Brown Mains water in ben jonson
